Dr Ehren Eksteen - Plastic Surgeon Pretoria

Dr Ehren Eksteen Plastic Surgeon Pretoria is registered with the Health Professions Council of South Africa as a specialist Plastic and Reconstructive Surgeon.

He is a full member of the Association of Plastic and Reconstructive Surgeons of South Africa APRSSA.
QUOTATIONS
Please note that quotations are individualized to your needs and to the findings of your consultation with the plastic surgeon after he has examined you.
